CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The LUMO energy levels were calculated from the difference of the HOMO energy levels and optical band gaps according to the equation : LUMO = ( HOMO + E opt g ) eV , which lies in the range of -3.79 ∼ -3.88 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels |
| LUMO energy levels |
| optical band gaps |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels |
| LUMO energy levels |
| optical band gaps |

(Note: In this context, "energy levels" can be considered as properties of materials, and "HOMO" and "LUMO" are specific types of energy levels related to materials.)
